Text:
So I have been selected for Mitsugoshi's Valentine
campaign...

It appears that Gamma really sees my value as a
performer.

(This is where I can get more popular, and get ahead
of Beta.)

(If I can achieve that, then it will be even more
certain that Master Shadow will choose me over
that all-natural girl!)
Sorry I'm late. I was busy with a deadline...
Oh, Beta?

Epsilon? What are you doing here? I'm here for the
meeting about the Valentine campaign...
I've been waiting for you both, Natsume, Shiron.

Hold on a moment, what's the meaning of this?! No one
told me that Beta was coming.
Maybe a communication mix-up? Sorry about that.

(If I had said that in advance I'm sure they wouldn't
have agreed to come. This is another business technique...)

Oh, are you going to break your promise...?
You wouldn't do such a thing, would you?
Ulp, o-of course not.
I can't be seen as untrustworthy...

(I really can't believe she is here, I was totally
unprepared for this.)

(Wait, I can think of this as a chance to beat her
directly! I am absolutely not going to lose!)
Good. You two seem ready. Let's get started...

Where did that measuring tape come from? Are you
going to measure something?

Yes, I want to make life-size chocolate statues of
the two of you for the campaign...

(Ugh! Measurements? That would be be bad! They'll
discover my "adjustments"...)

The measurements will take just a moment.
Please stay still.

I guess I have no choice... I'll cooperate, but please
make it quick.
Yes yes... Hmm, have your breasts got a bit bigger?
Probably...my clothes have gotten tighter.
(Grrrr! So envious!!!)
Okay, all done. Next, Shiron.
N-Not necessary.
Oh, but...

I can remember all of my measurements. I wrote down
all the numbers you need here.

(If I'm not touched right, and my pride collapses...
I absolutely can't let such a tragedy happen!)
But, you might have grown...

I measure myself every day. Here you go, these
are today's numbers.

E-Every day? Well...it's great that you've saved me
some time.
(Whew, I escaped that pinch somehow...)

Now that I have your measurements, let's begin our
meeting about the event.

As this will be a collaboration between Mitsugoshi
and two creatives, I would like you both to produce
something.

Produce... In my case, you mean like a
theme song?
You catch on quickly. Yes, exactly that.

As you are a songwriter, Shiron, I would like a
special song for our event.

And Natsume, as our resident writer, I would like you
to write an advertising slogan for this event.
Huh? An advertising slogan?!

(What should I do? I write novelsI've never thought
about advertising slogans.)

Yes, just something short and catchy which captures
the essence of the event.

(You got to be kidding me?! You think it's that
simple?!)

(It takes far more time and effort to write something
short and catchy than my usual long and elaborate
sentences...!)
That's a bit...
A special song for the event... All right, I'll do it.

Can you tell me afterwards what kind of song would be
good? And whether an existing song will do?

You want an image of the event...understood. Thank you
very much, Shiron!

(Urk... If Epsilon can manage this, and I can't,
I will lose status...)
O-Okay. I will think up some advertising slogans.

Thank you for consenting, Natsume. As Director Luna
of Mitsugoshi, I appreciate it.

(Ugh, I felt pressured and said okay. Will it really
be okay?! Can I do it? I mean, I'm...)
